 
Shubham is preparing for his mathmatics exams and he is unable to sove a question called amazing number. Shubham have to go out for a walk because he is studing for long time . As "Health is Wealth" therefore you must help shubham in getting his question solved.
The question states:-
Find the sum of the series to get answer to the amazing number
7+77+777+7777+... N terms.
As the answer will be very large you have to print answer modulo 10^9+7. 
 

Input

The first line of the input contains an integer T denoting the number of test cases. The description of T test cases follows.
An integer N denoting number of terms in series.

 

Output

For each test case, output a single line containing the answer to question.

 

Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 1000
1 ≤ N≤ 10000000

 

Example
Input:
15

Output:86415
